prompt: If A + B = A is father of B, A - B = A is mother of B, A × B = A is brother of B. Then P + Q × R means?
answers: P is father of Q who is brother of R
Q is brother of R, P is father of Q
explanation: P + Q: P is father of Q. Q × R: Q is brother of R.

prompt: If A $ B = A is wife of B, A # B = A is brother of B, A @ B = A is daughter of B. Then P @ Q $ R means?
answers: Q is wife of R, P is daughter of Q
P is daughter of Q's wife R
explanation: Q $ R: Q is wife of R. P @ Q: P is daughter of Q.

prompt: If P ÷ Q = P is father of Q, P × Q = P is sister of Q, P + Q = P is mother of Q. Then A ÷ B × C means?
answers: A is father of B who is sister of C
explanation: A ÷ B: A is father of B. B × C: B is sister of C.

prompt: If A * B = A is son of B, A $ B = A is father of B, A # B = A is sister of B. Then P * Q $ R means?
answers: P is son of Q who is father of R
explanation: P * Q: P is son of Q. Q $ R: Q is father of R. So P and R are siblings.

prompt: If + = mother, - = father, × = brother, ÷ = sister. Then A - B × C means?
answers: A is father of B, B is brother of C
explanation: A - B: A is father of B. B × C: B is brother of C.

prompt: If M @ N = M is daughter of N, M # N = M is husband of N. Then P @ Q # R means?
answers: P is daughter of Q who is husband of R
explanation: P @ Q: P is daughter of Q. Q # R: Q is husband of R.

prompt: If A → B = A is mother of B, A ← B = A is son of B. Then X → Y ← Z means?
answers: X is mother of Y, Y is son of Z
explanation: X → Y: X is mother of Y. Y ← Z: Y is son of Z.

prompt: If + = husband, - = wife, * = son, / = daughter. Then A + B * C means?
answers: A and B are C's parents
A is husband of B, B has son C
explanation: A + B: A is husband of B. B * C: B has son C (C is B's son).

prompt: If P % Q = P is father of Q, P & Q = P is wife of Q. Then A % B & C means?
answers: A is father of B, B is wife of C
explanation: A % B: A is father of B. B & C: B is wife of C. So C is A's son-in-law.

prompt: If $ = son, # = daughter, @ = husband, % = wife. Then A @ B $ C # D means?
answers: A is father of C and D
A is B's husband, C is B's son, D is B's daughter
explanation: A @ B: A is husband of B. B $ C: C is B's son. C # D: D is C's daughter.

prompt: If A + B = A is mother of B, A - B = A is sister of B, A * B = A is father of B. Then P * Q - R + S means?
answers: P is father of Q, Q is sister of R, R is mother of S
explanation: P * Q: P is father of Q. Q - R: Q is sister of R. R + S: R is mother of S.

prompt: If × = brother, + = father, - = mother, ÷ = sister. Then A + B ÷ C means?
answers: A is father of B, B is sister of C
explanation: A + B: A is father of B. B ÷ C: B is sister of C.

prompt: If A $ B = A is brother of B, A @ B = A is daughter of B, A * B = A is mother of B. Then P @ Q $ R means?
answers: P is daughter of Q, Q is brother of R
explanation: P @ Q: P is daughter of Q. Q $ R: Q is brother of R. So R is P's uncle.

prompt: If P → Q = P is son of Q, P ← Q = P is wife of Q. Then A ← B → C means?
answers: A is wife of B, B is son of C
explanation: A ← B: A is wife of B. B → C: B is son of C. So C is A's father-in-law.

prompt: If # = mother, @ = father, $ = sister, % = brother. Then A # B $ C % D means?
answers: A is mother of B, B is sister of C, C is brother of D
explanation: A # B: A is mother of B. B $ C: B is sister of C. C % D: C is brother of D.
